productInformation.value: #24,792 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #754 in Hair Shampoo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I always come back to this shampoo. I’m always tempted to try the next new thing to come along, but end up giving it to a family member to go back to this. I’m late 40’s (so lots of hormonal issues affecting my hair 😩),,, colored hair, almost shoulder length with tons of layers.. it’s a little on the dry side and thinning thanks to genetics and Mother Nature 🥴.I like the smell, and I’m someone who prefers no scent at all... I’m not a fan of the over-powering/sickening sweet fragrance that so many have nowadays. It just smells light and clean. I also love the fact that despite being sulfate free it lathers up... maybe I’m old school but I just like the feel of suds when washing my hair and most sulfatefree shampoos do not lather. It’s gentle on colored hair, and doesn’t strip color or make it fade faster than it should. Also, this is an almost 18oz bottle, so it lasts a good while. Hair feels soft but not heavy or weighed down. *The matching condirioner is great as well. And seeing some reviews of build-up - get the Neutrogena build up remover shampoo (also available here on Amazon and pretty much every store, drug store and grocery store). Use it once a week (depending on how often you wash your hair) -It’s gentle enough for even permed or color treated hair. I use it it every 4 or 5 times I wash my hair and have never had any issues with build up. *I actually found this shampoo by researching top shampoos for dry/thinning hair, and this was a top pick from Good Housekeeping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hair is super soft
reviews.reviewText: I began using this shampoo when my go to was discontinued. I loved my former shampoo and was skeptical about this one. However, I have found that my hair is just as soft, not frizzy, (which is impressive in the Florida humidity) and feels clean, not weighted down. The scent is nice, not strong. My hair is graying, not dyed or permed and slightly wavy. It tends to get frizzy without the right shampoo. I also use the Hair Food Smoothing conditioner. Both are great and much cheaper than my former shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SAVED MY HAIR!!
reviews.reviewText: My hair was was full of products and it would not hold a curl, which i have had never had a problem with before. I dont know what had happened, but I was so frustrated and confused. The texture of my hair was so off, like tons of products where just layering on hair and would not come off no matter what I did to try to make it better. I did some research and decided to give this a try due to being free of all the damaging products I was using and had been using for yrs that suddenly became a problem. Maybe its due my age and hormones. Either way my hair was not having anymore. So again, I bought this and literally a miracle happened. Let me say, I first used dawn dish soap to strip all the crap that was just sitting in my hair which worked amazing. I then waited 2 days before shampooing again. When I did, I used this! I have medium length hair and trust me when I say, you do not need more than 2 pumps to wash entire head. My hair is now feeling amazing. Shine is back and curls are now holding. I am so grateful I found this product. Fabulous!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars hydrating and gentle!
reviews.reviewText: i recently really wanted to branch out and try new shampoos/conditioners and browsed around for a set that would have clean ingredients, i tried this set for a few weeks and i definitely recommend it for the pricei don’t think it does anything extreme or makes a HUGE difference with hair but i have definitely noticed my hair being more softer/hydrated and have noticed a lot of compliments on my hair as of late! it smells amazing too, i have a really hard time with perfumey and strong smells and even the scents are really gentle and fresh :) i def think its worth a try if ur looking for something new

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your frizzy hair will thank you
reviews.reviewText: I have really bad frizzy hair and I started using kerase the shampoo and conditioner for frizzy hair and it made my hair even more frizzy but even with one use of this shampoo and conditioner, I can see a difference in my hair! It’s affordable and it actually works and it smells great! I would highly recommend this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I really never found a shampoo and conditioner that really truly made me happy for one reason or another but this particular shampoo did not dry my hair I have wavy curly hair so it does tend to dry easily and it's also coarse so when it's dry it's frizzy. I also use the conditioner with the shampoo it is also awesome. I washed my hair with the shampoo and the conditioner on Wednesday it's Friday and I got up and I just simply rinsed my hair not shampooing cuz I didn't have the time to mess with my hair and when it dried it was still soft shiny and not frizzy at all. I definitely recommend this shampoo and conditioner. I'm planning on looking to see what other products they have in their line and I will also give them a try and I hope there is great this dual turned out to be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!!
reviews.reviewText: I love how soft my hair feels after using this shampoo and conditioner! This and the conditioner together make my hair stronger and healthier! I noticed a difference in my hair after just one use! I love the smell and the results on my hair!

reviews.reviewText: Leaked shampoo all over the box and on other items in the box.
